body_html: Sounds like you are trying to use the session outside of the with block which is not allowed. You can just stick to sess=tf.Session() line, the with block is only useful if you are trying to use multiple sessions at the same time
body_text: Sounds like you are trying to use the session outside of the with block which is not allowed. You can just stick to sess=tf.Session() line, the with block is only useful if you are trying to use multiple sessions at the same time
body: Sounds like you are trying to use the session outside of the `with` block which is not allowed. You can just stick to `sess=tf.Session()` line, the `with` block is only useful if you are trying to use multiple sessions at the same time
